import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import FormData from "form-data"; import TimelineRight from "./timeline_right"; import UploadPost from "./timeline_right/UploadPost"; function Timeline() { const [data, setData] = useState([]); const [user, setUser] = useState(); useEffect(() => { const id = localStorage.getItem("id"); // const username = localStorage.getItem("username"); axios .get("http://localhost:3002/upload/getpost") .then((response) => { console.log(response) setData(response.data); }); axios .post("http://localhost:3002/auth/users", { "_id": id}) .then((response) => { setUser(response.data.username); }); }, []); return (
